definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: I promised faithfully to be home at six.
sentences.chinese: 我答應過6點鐘一準回家的。

sentences.english: Your physique good, understood at a glance one lives dies.
sentences.chinese: 您體格好啊，一看就知道一準兒活到死。

sentences.english: He must have known what was coming.
sentences.chinese: 他一準是早就知道了接下來就要丟臉了。

sentences.english: Well, you're goin a go where you look.
You like it here, don't you, Huck?
sentences.chinese: 你一準喜歡這兒，對不對，哈克？
